abstract: Óscar David Suazo Velázquez (born 5 November 1979 in San Pedro Sula) is a Honduran retired football striker. Recently he was named the Assistant Coach of Cagliari Calcio, the club of his life and where he is the historic goal scorer. Suazo played more than 300 league games and scored over 100 league goals in the Italian league during a period of 13 years.
